ValidationRule.description: The Source field cannot be inbound if the Marketing Source field is outbound and vice versa.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Outbound"), ISPICKVAL(Marketing_Source__c, "Inbound")),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Inbound"), ISPICKVAL(Marketing_Source__c,"Outbound"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Source cannot be both inbound and outbound. Please check the 'Source' and 'Marketing Source' fields.
